name: agent-testing-platform
description: UX Design Agent Testing Platform - browse agents, manage iterations, embedded terminals

scripts.build: cd client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code 2>/dev/null || true
